review: I find this app very useful, I use it to help me to understand when I need to slow down and take some time to relax and also when to use my time productively. This is very useful to me because I was suffering from a lot of fatigue and burnout, it has helped me to become aware of how much I am doing for myself or how much I am doing that wears me out. It would be helpful if there were more tips associated with these times but I have learnt how to use it in my own way.
title: Stress monitor

review: Great concept of the app, but for me, it would be amazing to have a free version, even if it has ads in it.
title: Great concept, poor execution

review: Transparency on the fact that this app needs a subscription to be used would be good to include in the information.
title: Subscription is needed to use
developerResponse: {'id': 25850206, 'body': 'Hi! Our App calculates personal algorithm for monitoring stress and your stress highlights. In the iPhone app you’ll find deep dive analytics and premium features. If you are not sure about the subscription, you can continue to use our Stress Monitor App on your Apple Watch for free and see how it works for you. If you have any questions about the app - feel free to contact us at dev@activeace.app. Best Wishes, Elena', 'modified': '2021-10-23T21:00:14Z'}

review: My apple watch us very sporadic with picking up the data euring
title: Not picking up all the data
developerResponse: {'id': 30395016, 'body': 'Hi! We are sorry, you are disappointed with the app. Our app processes the data that your Apple Watch records to Apple Health App during the day. The number of measurements depends on how active you are because some measurements happen when you are at rest for some time. We recommend considering weekly trends to understand how your body copes with stress over time. Please, feel free to contact us at dev@activeace.app if you have any other questions. Best Wishes, Elena Strok Founder of Stress Monitor App', 'modified': '2022-06-16T13:38:41Z'}

review: Once you’ve answered all the questions, it requires you to sign up! That’s quite stressful, increases the rate! I highly do not recommend this app
title: Not free at all

A great disappointment.
